AVR065: LCD Driver for the STK502 Documentation

Atmel AVR Application Note

Introduction

This documents the software for application note AVR065; This is an LCD Driver for the STK502.

Compilation Info

This software was compiled with IAR Embedded Workbench, 4.12A. To use GCC the source have to be modified.
To make project with IAR EWAVR:
Add the .c files to project (main.c and LCD_driver.c). Use device --cpu=m169, enable bit definitions in I/O include files, output format: ubrof8 for Debug and intel_extended for Release

Device Info

The example is written for ATmega169(P), but can be adapted to ATmega329(P) and ATmega649(P).

Contact Info

For more info about Atmel AVR visit http://www.atmel.com/products/AVR/
For application notes visit http://www.atmel.com/dyn/products/app_notes.asp?family_id=607
Support mail: avr@atmel.com
